entry.tran: 防火障(森林中为防止火势蔓延而清出的一条空旷地带)
entry.def: A firebreak is an area of open land in a wood or forest that has been created to stop a fire from spreading.

means.word_mean: 1. a narrow field that has been cleared to check the spread of a prairie fire or forest fire
